entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, Harry Potter. He is described as running up to his bedroom and then making his way back downstairs.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, mentioned in the context of picking up her cage.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The family that Harry lives with. They are described as leaving the house in a car.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: One of the Dursleys, mentioned in the context of being in the backseat of the car.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: The son of Aunt Petunia and Uncle Vernon. He is mentioned as being in the backseat of the car.

entities.name: dedalus
entities.description: A person whose top hat was visible between Aunt Petunia and Dudley in the backseat of the car.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: The street where Harry lives with the Dursleys. The car turned right at the end of Privet Drive.

relationships.description: Harry is described as picking up Hedwig's cage, indicating that he owns her.
The text states that Harry lives with the Dursleys.
Aunt Petunia is mentioned as being in the backseat of the car with her son Dudley.
The text states that Harry lives at Privet Drive.
